attributes.action: Vote of no confidence in the current co-alition government
attributes.additional_details: The people of Great Britain need a strong government, leading us from Westminster on issues converning Great Britain and not those of the EU.  The coalition government have failed on this and we the people need to be given the opportunity to stand and state enough is enough and we feel time its time for a new election and a new government.

rejection.details: Votes of No confidence are a matter for the House of Commons
